title: Loanable funds market and financial capital flows

content.prompt: Which of the following will most likely cause an inflow of financial capital to Canada?

choices.label: An increase in the Canadian federal budget deficit
An increase in the Canadian money supply
An increase in private savings in Canada
An increase in taxes on investment in plant and equipment
An increase in the real interest rates of Canadaâ€™s trading partners

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
